title: Verify the Order file and Patron account file details is correctly displayed in both bushnell and score Feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Pre-requisite
 
Turn off Patron Jobs in Datamart
2. Create an order using a new Patron create in PV
3. Run the both bushnell and score FEED workflow 
in Informatica.
4. Once the â€˜Ordersâ€™ task get succeeded and Patron task is Successeded, verify the file in Win Scp
5. Verify the corresponding files- order and patron 
account files
6. Run the both bushnell and score FEED workflow 
in Informatica.
7. Once the â€˜Ordersâ€™ task get succeeded and Patron task is Successeded, verify the file in Win Scp
8. Verify the corresponding files- order and patron 
account files
9. Update the patron and add seats to orders
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be completed successfully
2. The order should be completed successfully
3. The workflow should be run
4. The output file should be generated in Win Scp
5. All details should be updated to the 
corresponding files
6. The workflow should be run
7. The output file should be generated in Win Scp
8. All updated details should be updated to the 
corresponding files
9. User should be able to update both patron 
and order
